sql.query:
SELECT *
FROM familyCharges
WHERE family = :P1 /* {{$_GET.familyid}} */
ORDER BY chargeFor DESC

SELECT SUM(tp.amount) as paid, (SELECT SUM(pw.enr_grandTotal) FROM perWeekEnrolmentCharges pw WHERE pw.chargeId = :P1) as enrolTotals
FROM tuitionLinePayments tp JOIN perWeekEnrolmentCharges pw ON tp.enrolchargeid = pw.id WHERE pw.chargeId = :P1;

SELECT CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), '+00:00','Australia/Sydney') > c.dueDate as overdue
FROM familyCharges c
WHERE c.id = :P1
LIMIT 1;

SELECT DISTINCT tpayments.*, pt.pay_type
FROM (
    SELECT tp.*
    FROM tuitionPayments tp
        LEFT JOIN tuitionLinePayments tlp ON tp.id = tlp.paymentid
        LEFT JOIN perWeekEnrolmentCharges pw ON tlp.enrolchargeid = pw.id
        WHERE pw.chargeId = :P1
    ) tpayments LEFT JOIN paymentTypes pt ON tpayments.paymentType = pt.id
ORDER BY tpayments.paymentdate DESC

SELECT tuitionLinePayments.paymentid, tuitionLinePayments.amount, students.firstName AS studentFirst, students.lastName AS studentLast, perWeekEnrolmentCharges.classDate, perWeekEnrolmentCharges.net_grandTotal, perWeekEnrolmentCharges.enr_grandTotal, days.name AS dayName, classes.startTimeDisplay, classLevels.name AS levelName, staff.firstName AS instructorFirst, staff.lastName AS instructorLast
FROM tuitionLinePayments
INNER JOIN students ON (students.id = tuitionLinePayments.studentid) INNER JOIN perWeekEnrolmentCharges ON (perWeekEnrolmentCharges.id = tuitionLinePayments.enrolchargeid) INNER JOIN classes ON (classes.id = perWeekEnrolmentCharges.classId) INNER JOIN classLevels ON (classLevels.id = classes.classLevel) INNER JOIN staff ON (staff.id = classes.instructor) INNER JOIN days ON (days.id = classes.day)
WHERE tuitionLinePayments.paymentid = :P1 /* {{id}} */
ORDER BY tuitionLinePayments.studentid ASC, perWeekEnrolmentCharges.classDate ASC, perWeekEnrolmentCharges.enrolid ASC

SELECT SUM(tpayments.amount) AS paymentsTotal
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT tlp.*
    FROM tuitionPayments tp
        LEFT JOIN tuitionLinePayments tlp ON tp.id = tlp.paymentid
        LEFT JOIN perWeekEnrolmentCharges pw ON tlp.enrolchargeid = pw.id
        WHERE pw.chargeId = :P1
    ) tpayments

SELECT s.id, s.firstName, s.lastName, COUNT(DISTINCT e.enrolid) AS enrolmentsCount, SUM(e.enr_grandTotal) AS enrolmentsTotal
FROM students s JOIN perWeekEnrolmentCharges e ON s.id = e.studentid
WHERE s.family = :P1 AND e.chargeId = :P2 
GROUP BY s.id, s.firstName, s.lastName

SELECT DISTINCT SUM(perWeekEnrolmentCharges.enr_grandTotal) AS classTotal, perWeekEnrolmentCharges.enrolid, enrolments.student, enrolments.startDate, enrolments.dropDate, classes.startTimeDisplay AS classStartTime, classes.endTimeDisplay AS classEndTime, classLevels.name AS classLevelName, days.name AS classDay, staff.firstName AS instructorFirst, staff.lastName AS instructorLast, perWeekEnrolmentCharges.classId
FROM perWeekEnrolmentCharges
LEFT JOIN enrolments ON (enrolments.id = perWeekEnrolmentCharges.enrolid) INNER JOIN classes ON (classes.id = perWeekEnrolmentCharges.classId) INNER JOIN classLevels ON (classLevels.id = classes.classLevel) INNER JOIN days ON (days.id = classes.day) INNER JOIN staff ON (staff.id = classes.instructor)
WHERE perWeekEnrolmentCharges.chargeId = :P1 /* {{chargeid}} */ AND perWeekEnrolmentCharges.studentid = :P2 /* {{id}} */
GROUP BY perWeekEnrolmentCharges.enrolid, enrolments.student, enrolments.startDate, enrolments.dropDate, classes.startTimeDisplay, classes.endTimeDisplay, classLevels.name, days.name, staff.firstName, staff.lastName, perWeekEnrolmentCharges.classId

SELECT DISTINCT *
FROM perWeekEnrolmentCharges
WHERE chargeId = :P1 /* {{chargeid}} */ AND enrolid = :P2 /* {{enrolid}} */
